function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Higher infection rates linked to lower housing conditions","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and higher infection rates in poorer housing conditions","Mitigation":"Improving housing conditions, implementing public health measures, and providing better access to healthcare","Technologies":"Smart home technologies, air ventilation systems, and environmental monitoring sensors","People":"Population living in lower housing conditions, densely populated areas, and areas with poor medical treatment conditions","Owner":"Governments, public health authorities, real estate developers"},{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on housing market prices","Impact":"Decrease in housing market prices in highly populated areas, and increase in less densely populated areas","Mitigation":"Implementing housing policies based on demand preferences and conducting surveys on the impact of COVID-19 on the real estate market","Technologies":"Real estate market analysis tools, data analytics for demand forecasting, and remote viewing technologies","People":"Real estate industry, local communities, and decision makers","Owner":"Real estate policymakers, government agencies, and housing market analysts"},{"Description":"Increase in home size and extra bedrooms in densely populated areas","Impact":"Changes in housing preferences leading to larger homes in densely populated areas","Mitigation":"Developing new design and planning initiatives based on the current needs of the local communities","Technologies":"Urban planning software, architectural design tools, and sustainable building materials","People":"Local communities in densely populated areas","Owner":"Urban planners, real estate developers, and housing designers"}]}
